LearningContent.item2: Find out how to get started
LearningContent.card1text: Set up your wallet of choice. Connect it to the Animarket by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner.
LearningContent.card2text: Upload your work and setup your collection. Add a description, social links and floor price.
LearningContent.card3text: Choose between auctions and fixed-price listings. Start earning by selling your NFTs or trading others.
